definition: to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: If these requirements are not met, a driving license may not be renewed.
sentences.chinese: 不符合这些要求的话，驾驶执照就不能续用。

sentences.english: It was impossible to hurry through the process of getting a driver's license.
sentences.chinese: 想匆忙赶完得到驾驶执照的过程是不可能的。

sentences.english: Copy of HKID Card and Driving License of the driver.
sentences.chinese: 司机的香港身份证及驾驶执照副本。

sentences.english: Q: Would you mind showing me your driving license?
sentences.chinese: 能给我看一下您的驾驶执照吗？

sentences.english: The junior and senior of the senate all have driver's licenses.
sentences.chinese: 商讨院的年父老以及幼年者都有驾驶执照。

sentences.english: At the scene of the accident pone number and license numbers were exchanged.
sentences.chinese: 在意外现场，电话号码及驾驶执照号必须交换的。

sentences.english: Critics have expressed doubt the drivers' license scheme will have the desired effects.
sentences.chinese: 评论者们怀疑驾驶执照这一方案不会产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: In many countries, a driving license is a valid proof of indentity .
sentences.chinese: 驾驶执照在很多国家是有效的身份证明。

sentences.english: Mr. Lee: Hmmm … a photo I. D. I have my New Jersey driver's license. Is that ok?
sentences.chinese: 有照片的证件。我有新泽西的驾驶执照，可以吗？

sentences.english: Possessing B-class driving license, proficient in driving skills.
sentences.chinese: 具有B驾驶执照，熟练驾驶技能。

sentences.english: I take out my wallet and show Marla my driver's license with my real name.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的钱包拿出来，给玛拉看我驾驶执照上的真名。

sentences.english: Both of you please give me your licenses and registrations .
sentences.chinese: 你们二位给我看看驾驶执照和车辆登记卡。

sentences.english: Removable cab roof section for ease of driving.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸出租车驾驶执照方便屋顶部分。

sentences.english: I used my driver's license as identification.
sentences.chinese: 我用驾驶执照作为身份证明。

sentences.english: the junior and senior of the senate all have driver's licenses.
sentences.chinese: 商讨院的年父老和幼年者都有驾驶执照。

definition: length of experience as a driver
to renew a certificate (ID card etc)/to leave an ID at the desk to gain entrance
